definition: to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: John was on the balcony below, looking up at me, and he smiled.
sentences.chinese: 而约翰就在下面的阳台上，仰头望着我，微笑着。

sentences.english: This is a yellow leaves falling in season, look up, full Shuqing chung.
sentences.chinese: 本该是个黄叶纷飞的季节，仰头，满树青舂。

sentences.english: This is not the distance between the sea and the sky, just missing the height up apart.
sentences.chinese: 海与天之间本没有距离，相隔的只是仰头思念的高度。

sentences.english: He grabs hold of the cell door, rears his head back and bashes it into the metal bars.
sentences.chinese: 他抓紧了牢门，向后仰头然后用力撞向金属栅栏条。

sentences.english: Now you see these two ladies looking up at the tree.
sentences.chinese: 现在你们看到这两个女士仰头看着树。

sentences.english: The guy gets up on the lifeguard tower and all his friends look up.
sentences.chinese: 这个有钱人站上救生塔，所有朋友都仰头看着他。

sentences.english: Look up, with the most perfect radian hide your vulnerability.
sentences.chinese: 仰头，用最完美的弧度掩饰自己的脆弱。

sentences.english: You can look at the stars, but watch where you're going.
sentences.chinese: 你尽可以仰头望天，但也别忘了看好脚下。

sentences.english: Only at swallow does rear its head.
Most of the time will appear in the head backward or look up.
sentences.chinese: 多数时间会出现在向后仰头或者向上望的时候。

sentences.english: The man is taken away. Norton's gaze goes up.
sentences.chinese: 那个犯人被带走，诺顿仰头凝视。

sentences.english: At this point, they bend their knees lightly and swing their hair to the back violently.
sentences.chinese: 这时，她们随即微屈双膝，用力仰头将头发甩起。

sentences.english: People who look half asleep will suddenly throw their heads back with a start and fling out their arms.
sentences.chinese: 那些半睡半醒的人会突然向后仰头张开双臂。

sentences.english: When I looked up at Barrett's ugly face, it was grim.
sentences.chinese: 我仰头看着巴雷特那张凶险的脸庞，那上面只有冷酷。

sentences.english: Once you're in position, slightly tilt your head back and extend the tip of your tongue just past your bottom lip.
sentences.chinese: 到达位置后，轻轻向后仰头，伸舌到稍微超过下唇。

sentences.english: Yang Touxiang blue sky, but see Yan Nanfei.
sentences.chinese: 仰头向青天，但见雁南飞。

definition: to face upwards/to look up to the sky
to raise one's head/to gain ground/account name, or space for writing the name on checks, bills etc
to drain the cup in one gulp (idiom)
big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
very loudly/at the top of one's voice
to get up on hind legs (esp. of horse)/to stand/to spring up
to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on
